title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, February 2, 2020
description: Today is the birthday of James Joyce (1882) and also the day his “Ulysses” was published in 1922. He said of writing, “In the particular is contained the universal.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of James Joyce (1882) and also the day his “Ulysses” was published in 1922. He said of writing, “In the particular is contained the universal.”
